thread.title: ABC Family's new fantasy series Shadowhunters gets first trailer - US TV
thread.title_full: ABC Family's new fantasy series Shadowhunters gets first trailer - US TV News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: ABC Family's new fantasy series Shadowhunters gets first trailer - US TV
text: ABC Family has released a teaser trailer for new fantasy series Shadowhunters - and it looks amazing.The series is based on the Mortal Instruments young adult book series by Cassandra Clare.Shadowhunters follows 18-year-old Clary (Katherine McNamara), who discovers on her birthday that she is a Shadowhunter - a group of human-angel hybrids who hunt down demons.The kidnapping of Clary's mother sparks the young girl to go demon hunting with fellow Shadowhunter Jace (Dominic Sherwood) and her best friend Simon (Alberto Rosende).Alan Van Sprang will take on the role of villain Valentine Morgenstern, while Maxim Roy, Emeraude Toubia, Matthew Daddario and Glee star Harry Shum Jr will also appear. Â© ABC Being Human's Jon Cor will play mysterious weapons trainer Hodge Starkweather in the series.Ed Decter (Unforgettable) has been confirmed as the series showrunner and executive producer.Shadowhunters will air on ABC in 2016.
